greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if sigma(2n) - sigma(n) is a power of 2, otherwise 0.
comment: a(n) = 1 if n is a squarefree product of Mersenne primes (A000668) multiplied by a power of 2, otherwise 0.
c(n) = a(n)*A000035(n) is the characteristic function of A046528.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = 1 iff A336922(n) = 0, i.e., when A331410(n) is equal to A005087(n).
xref: Cf. also A336477 (analogous sequence for Fermat primes).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 09 2020
